Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/6 · BA 5529 · Tänze I · ed. Walburga Litschauer [nos. 1, 2 (two versions), 3 (three versions), 4, 5 (two versions), 6 (three versions), 7–13, 15–16, 22–24, 29–31, 32 (two versions), 33 (two versions) and 34–36, with further incipits for nos. 1–4, and sketches for nos. 17–18, 25 and 28]
  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/7 · BA 5530 · Tänze II · ed. Walburga Litschauer [with no. 2 in two versions]
  • Associated Board · Thirty-three Dances · ed. Howard Ferguson [nos. 1–3, 5–8, 10, 14–15 and 32–33]
  • Henle · HN 74 · Sämtliche Tänze / Band I · ed. Paul Mies
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50021 · Sämtliche Tänze für Klavier / Band 1 · ed. Alexander Weinmann
